item.title: Launching Hugo website on Github
item.description: Publishing a website often requires you to buy a domain name first. A domain name is like having a real estate online. For example, if you bought the domain “yourwebsite.com” you have complete control of what is being published on that domain and its corresponding ‘sub’-URLs, such as “yourwebsite.com/about”. Even though most domain names are not very expensive it can be a bit intimidating to buy one. However, there are alternatives!
